Plot: Filmmaker and gay activist Sridhar Rangayan embarks on a personal journey to expose the human rights violations faced by the LGBTQ community in India due to a draconian law Section 377 and homophobic social mores of a patriarchal society.
Title: Breaking Free
Actors: Vivek Anand, Manohar Elavarthi, Anand Grover, Ashok Row Kavi
